name: ngx-drag-resize
description: The project contains Angular library that provides opportunity to use drag and resize functionality on HTML element

scripts.build:lib:prod: npm run test:lib && ng run ngx-drag-resize:build:production
scripts.build:demo:prod: npm run build:lib:prod && npm run test:demo && ng run ngx-drag-resize-demo:build:production
scripts.build:demo:prod-gh-pages: npm run build:lib:prod && npm run test:demo && ng run ngx-drag-resize-demo:build:production,gh-pages
scripts.docs:lib: npm run test:lib && npm run compodoc --prefix projects/ngx-drag-resize
scripts.lib:version:major: npm run test:lib && npm run version:major --prefix projects/ngx-drag-resize
scripts.lib:version:minor: npm run test:lib && npm run version:minor --prefix projects/ngx-drag-resize
scripts.lib:version:patch: npm run test:lib && npm run version:patch --prefix projects/ngx-drag-resize
